plays.text: Goal scored by Peter Forsberg assisted by Milan Hejduk and Steve Reinprecht
Goal scored by Marian Gaborik assisted by Matt Johnson and Jim Dowd
Penalty to Matt Johnson 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Adam Foote
Goal scored by Greg de Vries assisted by Rob Blake and Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Eric Messier 2 minutes for Tripping Matt Johnson
Penalty to Derek Morris 2 minutes for Holding Jim Dowd
Goal scored by Rob Blake assisted by Adam Foote and Jeff Shantz
Penalty to Alex Tanguay 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Jim Dowd assisted by Sergei Zholtok and Filip Kuba
Goal scored by Dean McAmmond assisted by Steve Reinprecht
Penalty to Jim Dowd 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Eric Messier 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for Holding Filip Kuba
